email_sent.welcome_message: We're excited to have you on board. You can start enjoying the benefits of GymPro very soon!
email_sent.title: Check Your Email
email_sent.description: We've sent a verification link to your email address. Please check your inbox and click the link to verify your account.
email_sent.success_description: Your account has been created and a verification email has been sent to your inbox.
email_sent.info_description: Check your spam folder or try resending the verification email. The email might take a few minutes to arrive.
email_sent.resend_error: Failed to resend verification email. Please try again.
email_sent.no_email_error: No email address found. Please sign up again.
email_sent.resend_cooldown: Please wait {{time}} seconds before requesting another email.

verifyEmail.successMessage: Your email has been verified and you are now logged in.
verifyEmail.error: Email verification failed. Please try again.
verifyEmail.missingToken: Verification token is missing. Please check your email link.
